summary: Research on application of Bayesian optimization on dynamically changing problems.

company: [Ludwig Maximilian University of Munich, Chair of Statistical Learning and Data Science](https://www.slds.stat.uni-muenchen.de/people/richter/)
summary: Member of the Automated Machine Learning research group, research on multi-objective optimization, lecture on automated machine learning, and working on open source projects for machine learning in R: [mlr3](https://mlr3.mlr-org.com/), [mlr3tuning](https://mlr3.mlr-org.com/), [mlr3hyperband](https://mlr3.mlr-org.com/).

company: TU Dortmund University, Faculty of Statistics
summary: Finished my PhD, Research on parallelization for Bayesian optimization, hyperparameter optimization for expensive machine learning problems, and worked on various open source projects for machine learning in R: [mlr](https://mlr.mlr-org.com/), [mlrMBO](https://mlrmbo.mlr-org.com/), [mlrHyperopt](https://jakob-r.de/mlrHyperopt/).

company: TU Dortmund University, Faculty of Statistics
summary: Connected multiple machine learning methods to the R-package [mlr](https://mlr.mlr-org.com/).

company: TU Dortmund University, Center for Research on Education and School Development (IFS)
summary: Implemented a system to create automated reports based on current research surveys, that were used in the final publication [TIMSS 2011](http://www.ifs.tu-dortmund.de/cms/de/Forschung/Abgeschlossene-Projekte/TIMSS-2011-Grundschule.html).
